CodeplexIssue.Title: Convert Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ApplicationClass to NetOffice.COMObject
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
Hello,
I use Edraw Office Viewer to integrated MS Word in my WinForm Application.
The Tool has a method GetApplication. (See next lines) Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application application = (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application) axEDOffice1.GetApplication();
Now I wanted to attached the application object to NetOffice.WordApi.Application Object. (Because I want to use the NetOffice Api to excecute commands.)
Is that possible ?
Thanks a lot, Andreas
